definitions: the quality or state of being bare and inhospitable

examples.text: the bleakness of that destroyed landscape

shortDefinitions: quality or state of being bare and inhospitable

definitions: the quality or state of cold and miserable weather
shortDefinitions: quality or state of cold and miserable weather

definitions: the quality or state of being hopeless, discouraging, or unlikely to have a favorable outcome

examples.text: this story is marked by unrelenting bleakness
the atrocities and bleakness of war

shortDefinitions: quality or state of being hopeless, discouraging, or unlikely to have favourable outcome
